title: Spring Gardening Tips to Increase Harvest Yield To Do Now
itunes:title: Spring Gardening Tips to Increase Harvest Yield To Do Now
description:
These easy spring gardening tips with help increase your harvest yield and the amount of fruit and vegetables you bring in this summer. Do these now during early spring to set yourself up for an exceptional growing season. Learn how to apply these tips to your property and garden. Get show notes and resources at https://melissaknorris.com/172 
Melissa shares what's worked in their homestead and how to avoid some of the common mistakes they made early on.

itunes:subtitle: how to increase your garden's harvest this year
author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
